alert.note: Alert for Colfax; Harding; Mora (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 10:15PM MDT until June 11 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Harding County in northeastern New Mexico... Northeastern Mora County in northeastern New Mexico... Southeastern Colfax County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 1100 PM MDT. * At 1015 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Abbott, or 10 miles east of Springer, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abbott. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. High winds and large hail can spread quickly across open rangeland.
